dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.
dependencies.name: expat

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.
dependencies.name: openssl

dependencies.description: pacparser is a library to parse proxy auto-config (PAC) files.
dependencies.name: pacparser

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

dependent_to.description:
CORAL is an abstraction layer with an SQL-free API to access data stored
using relational database technologies. It is used directly by
experiment-specific applications and internally by COOL.
dependent_to.name: coral

description:
The Frontier distributed database caching system distributes data from
data sources to many client systems around the world. The name comes
from "N Tier" where N is any number and tiers are layers of locations of
distribution.
name: frontier-client

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
